name: AVAssetDownloadURLSession
desc: A URL session that creates and executes asset download tasks.

items.name: init(configuration: URLSessionConfiguration, assetDownloadDelegate: AVAssetDownloadDelegate?, delegateQueue: OperationQueue?)
items.desc: Creates a URL session to download assets.

items.name: protocol AVAssetDownloadDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to asset-download events.

items.name: func makeAssetDownloadTask(downloadConfiguration: AVAssetDownloadConfiguration) -> AVAssetDownloadTask
items.desc: Creates a download task that uses the specified configuration.

items.name: class AVAssetDownloadConfiguration
items.desc: An object that provides the configuration for a download task.

items.name: func makeAssetDownloadTask(asset: AVURLAsset, assetTitle: String, assetArtworkData: Data?, options: [String : Any]?) -> AVAssetDownloadTask?
items.desc: Creates a download task to download the asset.

items.name: func aggregateAssetDownloadTask(with: AVURLAsset, mediaSelections: [AVMediaSelection], assetTitle: String, assetArtworkData: Data?, options: [String : Any]?) -> AVAggregateAssetDownloadTask?
items.desc: Creates a download task to download the asset and media selections.
